verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%>; and <S%H8172>rely<s%> on <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, because they are <S%H7227>many<s%>; and in <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, because they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>strong<s%>; but they <S%H8159>look<s%> not unto the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>!

When the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, both he that <S%H5826>helps<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%>, and he that is <S%H5826>helped<s%> shall fall <S%H5307>down<s%>, and they all shall <S%H3615>fail<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

For thus has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoken<s%> unto <S%H738>me<s%>, Like as the lion and the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H1897>roaring<s%> on his <S%H2964>prey<s%>, when a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> is called <S%H7121>forth<s%> against <S%H2865>him<s%>, he will not be afraid of their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor <S%H6031>abase<s%> himself for the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of <S%H3068>them<s%>: so shall the Lord of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H6633>fight<s%> for <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and for the hill <S%H1389>there<s%>.

<S%H7725>Turn<s%> you unto him from whom the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5627>revolted<s%>.
